<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mercurial Mantle](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1067)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Apex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=10" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 187 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 24,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn cloak

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This deep red cloak fits lightly about your shoulders, and the edges perpetually twitch slightly, as though caught in a breeze. The cloth feels smoother than silk, rippling and swaying like liquid when in motion. You feel a lively energy infusing your arms and legs. You gain a +3 item bonus to [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) and [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15), and a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against attacks from reactions triggered by your movement.

 When you invest the cloak, you either increase your Dexterity score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever would give you a higher score.
